name: Falling From the Rabbit Hole
description:
Falling From The Rabbit Hole tells a tale of Alice’s sisters, as it follows the scenario of “what if Alice never discovered the rabbit hole?”. As a result, her two sisters fall into Wonderland instead and are forced to fulfil Alice’s destiny to wander the land and tell the untold story of its people.

As the older, more level-headed sister, Elsie must traverse this strange divided land to seek out her younger sister Tilly, while also interacting with the somewhat familiar, yet changed characters of this alternate Wonderland who all have their own stories to tell.

- - -

Your choices will have consequences in this game and will result in different outcomes, so be careful of them!

  • three alternate endings! (and a couple of bad ones)
  • the opportunity to pet cute doggos! (completely mandatory)
  • Light-hearted humour (nothing too dark!)
